channel.title: Why can't I and other people connect to my server?
channel.description:
I used to have a server and everyone could connect to it, but then I un-installed the JDK 6.0.
No i have re-installed it and everythings fine my no-ip is working I compile properly it says "starting Pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555"
But I can't connect using my no-ip neither can anyone else. Please help
NOTE: Last time I didn't port forward, and Ive tried to go to Mod Tharoks Ultimate server guide but it says "this topic is either no longer on these boards or Off-limits to you" or w/e
Somebody please help!

item.title: Why can't I and other people connect to my server?

port forward?
just use ur ip…

item.title: Why can't I and other people connect to my server?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

yeah sometime if you don’t use the port for a while your router resets it. (prevents people hacking throw that port.)
